server.model.minigames

Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.model.minigames.EventManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class EventManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Manages events which will be run in the future. Has its own thread since some events may need to be ran faster than the cycle time in the main thread.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds an event.

      Gets the event manager singleton.

      void shutdown()
      Shuts the event manager down.

    • Method Detail

      • getSingleton

        public static EventManager getSingleton()
        Gets the event manager singleton. If there is no singleton, the singleton is created.
        Returns:
        The event manager singleton.

        Initialises the event manager (if it needs to be).
